Chola Mandalam Finances offers loan like Rural Finances, SME and TRIP finances to their customers. It

Masters, Card Management, Billing, SMS system etc.

Brief Description:

The Billing Access Layer (BAL) will be the single entry point into the Billing and Payments Domain for all transactional and most batch interactions. This layer will be provided on a resilient platform to ensure a response is available to all calling platforms so that the Billing and Payments Platform may provide the Capabilities and associated Operations, which are used, by other platforms to fulfill their requirements. 

These capabilities and operations are the building blocks to make up the Matrix Capabilities, and as such the BAL is a key component in the One IT strategic architecture. In general, the interface into the Billing Access Layer will use industry standards where possible.

1) Have worked in bulk migration of assets. 

2) Worked in automation testing of new requirement in Oracle PL/SQL and Unix.
Responsibilities:

1. Design and develop new components for various functionalities for BAL. 

2. Design and develop solutions for backend functionalities. 

3. Discussions with downstream application teams to understand the impact of changes. 

4. Preparing Analysis document and Functional and Technical Design Specifications. 

5. Understanding the project specification and system architecture. 

6. Review Code to ensure accuracy.

7. Discussion of business requirement with stalk holders and provided component inputs as required.

8. Issue analysis and providing root cause to suppress recurrent issue in test and production. 

9. Automation testing during requirement testing.

Description: This is a real time to-do-list planner where user can create/update the to-do-list for them. User can send friend requests, to other users on the system. Once requests are accepted, the friend is added in user's friend list. Friends are notified, in real time using notifications. Any friend can create/ update the to-do-list for any of their friends. User can add sub-to-do-items, as child of any item node, such that, complete list take a tree shape, with items and their child items. Any friend can undo, any number of actions, done in past. Each undo action, remove the last change, done by any user. On every action, all friends are notified, in real time, of what specific change is done by which friend. Also the list remain in sync with all friends, at any time, i.e. all actions are reflected in real time.
